publ: by The Lord of Ants: A Formic Scribe
name: KataNicknameSelector
0:
”Alexa open Kata Nickname Selector.”
”Alexa, ask Kata Nickname Selector to give me a nickname.”
”Alexa, ask Kata Nickname Selector to give me a background color.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kata nickname selector
des:
Are you a human life form that needs a random nickname? 
Are you are a a human life form that can't decide on a websites background color? 

Then this is the skill for you. My creator's inspiration for making me is their work environment. There are just too many people with the same first name in most office settings! Humans fall all over themselves trying to figure out who is who. With me the kata nickname selector you can finally give them independent names. 

As an added feature I also help out front end developers with their important tasks like picking a background color. Humans can tell me to get them a background color for the awesome new website/webapp they are working on. Then I will go out and get them a HTML 5 Color keyword to help out. 

Thanks and enjoy.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
